headline: What DexCom (DXCM)'s Strong Q4 Beat and 2026 Margin Guidance Means For Shareholders
summary: DexCom recently reported preliminary fourth-quarter results showing year-over-year revenue growth in both U.S. and international markets, beating consensus expectations and pairing this with guidance for higher 2026 revenue and improved adjusted margins. This stronger operational outlook has prompted many analysts to reiterate positive ratings even as some highlight rising competition in DexCom’s core insulin-intensive segments. Next, we’ll examine how DexCom’s upbeat 2026 guidance for...
